mapper.select: select * from employee_salary_sub where staff_id=#{staffId} and time=#{time}
mapper.insert: insert into employee_salary_sub (staff_id, "time", union_dues, water_elec_fee, housing_fund, pension) values (#{staffId},#{time},#{unionDues},#{waterElecFee},#{housingFund},#{pension})
mapper.update: update employee_salary_sub set union_dues=#{unionDues}, water_elec_fee=#{waterElecFee}, housing_fund=#{housingFund}, pension=#{pension} where staff_id=#{staffId} and time=#{time}
mapper.delete: delete from employee_salary_sub where staff_id=#{staffId} and time=#{time}
